mean.explanation: Mean is the expected value of data.

covariance.explanation: A Covariance Matrix shows the directional relationship between different data members.

num-Nan-rows.explanation: Num Nan Rows indicates the number of NaN rows found in the data.

percent-Nan-rows.explanation: Percent Nan Rows indicates the percentage of rows that are NaN in the data.

geometric-mean.explanation: The Geometric Mean shows the central tendency of a set of numbers. It is calculated by taking the n-th root of the product of n numbers.

kurtosis.explanation: Kurtosis is the tailedness of skewdness of data.

mode.explanation: Mode is the most often appearing value in a set of data values.

skew.explanation: Skew measures the symmetry of a data set.

kstat-1.explanation: A unique, symmetric and unbiased estimator of the first cumulant kappa-n

kstat-2.explanation: A unique, symmetric and unbiased estimator of the second cumulant kappa-n

kstat-3.explanation: A unique, symmetric and unbiased estimator of the third cumulant kappa-n

kstat-4.explanation: A unique, symmetric and unbiased estimator of the fourth cumulant kappa-n

variation.explanation: Indicates the ratio of the standard deviation to the mean. Higher values indicate higher spread.

iqr.explanation: IQR is the difference between the 75th and 25th percentile of data. A robust measure of dispersion.

sem.explanation: Standard Error of the mean is the standard deviation of the sampling distribution of the mean. Calculated by dividing the standard deviation by the root of the sample size.

bayes-mean.explanation: Bayesian estimate of upper and lower bounds of the population mean

bayes-mean-avg.explanation: Bayesian estimate of the population mean

bayes-var.explanation: Bayesian estimate of upper and lower bounds of the population mean

bayes-var-avg.explanation: Bayesian estimate of the population mean

bayes-std.explanation: Bayesian estimate of upper and lower bounds of the population standard deviation

bayes-std-avg.explanation: Bayesian estimate of the population standard deviation.

frozen-mean-var.explanation: Population variance of the mean estimator. https://scholarsarchive.byu.edu/facpub/278/

frozen-mean-std.explanation: Population standard deviation of the mean estimator. https://scholarsarchive.byu.edu/facpub/278/

frozen-variance-mean.explanation: Population variance of the mean estimator. https://scholarsarchive.byu.edu/facpub/278/

frozen-variance-var.explanation: Population variance of the variance estimator. https://scholarsarchive.byu.edu/facpub/278/

frozen-variance-std.explanation: Population variance of the standard deviation estimator. https://scholarsarchive.byu.edu/facpub/278/

frozen-std-mean.explanation: Population mean of the standard deviation estimator. https://scholarsarchive.byu.edu/facpub/278/

frozen-std-var.explanation: Population variance of the standard deviation estimator. https://scholarsarchive.byu.edu/facpub/278/

frozen-std-std.explanation: Population Standard deviation of the standard deviation estimator. https://scholarsarchive.byu.edu/facpub/278/
